{% extends "_templates/base.html" %} {% block content %} {% markdown %} ## Debugging Errors For debugging errors, FineUploader features a `debug` option 1. Set the `debug` option of the FineUploader to true. 2. Open the page where you have a FineUploader. 3. Open developer console in your browser. 4. Try to upload the file. You should see a server response. It should be `{"success":true}` for completed requests. If it's not, then you have a problem with your server-side script. {% endmarkdown %} {% endblock %}
